response.overview: ESWY is a love story that keeps finding its way back. It is magical happenstances and ill-fated heroes, undying love and miraculous punar-janams, crazed villains and unbelievable twists that tear through the fabric of reality and beckon you to dream. Are you ready to hop onto an adventure across lifetimes?
response.tagline: Are you ready to be fixed?
response.title: ESWY
